hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:I said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! I have two neighbors! To whom shall I send my gifts?" He said, "To the one whose gate in nearer to you

chapter.ara-name: باب حَقِّ الْجِوَارِ فِي قُرْبِ الأَبْوَابِ
chapter.eng-name: The neighbor whose gate is nearer has more right to receive favours
